column4: hi, is there any ubuntu server (64bit) installer which is using 2.6.18+ already? like remastered or something? i got a asus P5B mainboard - and the ide controller is not supported by kernel <= 2.6.18
you can try feisty .. but its only herd 4 today ..
there is a feisty 64bit server install cd?
thanks a lot. where can i see the used kernel version?
well, this should do the job ;)
but as the image name suggests: it`s supposed to run on a server... will i run into dependency problems, when changeing the sources.list to stable sources after install?
do you need server or client ?
i recommend to to install and keep sources as they are and then do a upgrade on march ..
well... sounds perfect. hopefully the installer is working
because if you change sources to edgy .. you will get a problem .
its herd 5 .. i wish you luki :d
